participant_1.background:
I feed my dog before I do anything else.
sometimes , i sit by strangers on the subway and strike up a conversation.
i work as a meeting coordinator.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
my mother is a teacher.

participant_2.background:
I love spending time with my friends, whether it's going out to dinner, seeing a movie, or just hanging out at home.
i like to read books.
I would buy a mobile for my baby's nursery.
I'm single now, but my longest relationship lasted for three years.
I want to be reincarnated as a cat so I can spend my days lazing around in the sun and chasing mice.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher.
Oh cool! What grade do you teach?
First grade.
That's awesome! I bet you love working with kids.
I do! It's the best. What do you do for work?
I work as a meeting coordinator.
Oh that sounds interesting. What's that like?
It's a lot of fun! I get to plan and coordinate meetings for different departments and companies.
That sounds like a great job. I'm jealous!
It's not so bad. What are some of your hobbies?
I love to read books, hang out with my friends, and go to the movies.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to read books too. What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose a favorite, but I really love "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
That's a great book! I've read it a few times myself.
Yeah, it's one of those books that you can read over and over again and still find something new each time.
I agree! What are some of your favorite movies?
I love a lot of different movies, but some of my favorites include "The Princess Bride", "The Shawshank Redemption", and "The Lord of the Rings" trilogy.
Those are all great movies! I love "The Princess Bride" and "The Shawshank Redemption" too.
They're both so good! I've seen them both so many times.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar taste in movies.
Me too! We should watch a movie together sometime.
That would be fun
